China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 5 日星期五 08:36:22 GMT 120
Fairy-tale ice sculptures lure droves of tourists into China's HarbinChina's annual Ice and Snow Festival, with its fairy-tale ice sculptures, opened on Friday attracting throngs of tourists who shuffled carefully over the slippy ice and snow and dragged their children in sledges around the park. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 08:14:50 GMT VZTAN76V4NOY7G2BHQXFEPT7PU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fairy-tale-ice-sculptures-lure-droves-tourists-into-china-harbin-2024-01-05/Nicoco Chan, Liz Lee世界中国
Tesla to fix 1.62 mln vehicles in China - regulatorTesla is doing an effective recall on 1.62 million vehicles, including its models S, X, 3 and Y in China, the market regulator said on Friday. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:57:34 GMT 4YI55BJA2RJCNF3TD3W73SRCCY https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/tesla-fixes-162-mln-vehicles-china-regulator-2024-01-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Foxconn expects Q1 revenue drop after slower Q4 demandTaiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, said on Friday it expected an on-year drop in first quarter revenue coming off a high base, after slower market demand hit the previous quarter. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:45:40 GMT JRE3CXBNWZI5VPUS5U7I2P3IVI https://www.reuters.com/technology/foxconn-december-sales-fall-269-years-earlier-2024-01-05/Ben Blanchard, Sarah Wu技术
Thermo Fisher halts forensic tech sales in TibetThermo Fisher Scientific has pledged to stop selling forensic technology and equipment in Tibet that could be used for identifying individuals, a spokesperson for the company said. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:37:18 GMT MN4V5SWVVVK4PCCJCOJFNRACO4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/thermo-fisher-halts-forensic-tech-sales-tibet-2024-01-05/Andrew Silver技术
Philippines remains open to diplomacy with China - national security adviserThe Philippines remains open to diplomatic discussions with China and believes the two nations can achieve a resolution to disputes over the South China Sea through peaceful dialogue, its national security adviser said in a statement on Friday. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 06:47:19 GMT YMDJ3HHIU5O2ZMJL3GBWC5XPWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-remains-open-diplomatic-discussions-with-china-national-security-2024-01-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
Exclusive: China pushes equity fund launches to support stock market -sourcesBeijing has informally asked some money managers in China to prioritise the launch of equity funds over other products like bond funds, four sources with direct knowledge of the matter said, as authorities scramble to revive its lagging stock market. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 06:23:56 GMT OTH5OCVRARIIHFENTPCYG3RDE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-pushes-equity-fund-launches-support-stock-market-sources-2024-01-05/Yu Xie, Samuel Shen世界中国
Taiwan election poses early 2024 test of U.S. aim to steady China tiesTaiwan's election next week poses challenges for Washington no matter who wins, with a victory for the ruling party sure to exacerbate tensions with China while an opposition triumph may raise awkward questions about the island's defense policies. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 05:05:47 GMT IJXJ52JVAVIL5K24KAD67WFF2A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-election-poses-early-2024-test-us-aim-steady-china-ties-2024-01-05/Michael Martina, David Brunnstrom世界亚太地区
Tesla trumps BYD in China sales efficiency with real-time strategyTesla's strategy in China of real-time, aggressive management of its sales staff is giving its stores an edge over dealerships offering BYD and other brands in the world's largest auto market, according to three people with knowledge of the matter. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 04:20:29 GMT TWUJXNVBJFO53KIX6R33LKDQRI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-trumps-bid-china-sales-efficiency-with-real-time-strategy-2024-01-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Lawmakers ask Pentagon to consider barring US investments in China's QuectelThe top Republican and Democrat on the U.S. House of Representatives' China committee on Thursday asked the Biden administration to consider adding China's Quectel Wireless to a list of Chinese military companies. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 15:14:26 GMT PMIODATB5FKPXBMIHN4J7F4Y7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/lawmakers-ask-pentagon-to-consider-barring-us-investments-china-quectel-2024-01-04/David Shepardson世界美国
Hong Kong tycoon's lawyers appeal to UN over witness torture accusationLawyers for Hong Kong pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Thursday they had appealed to the United Nations expert on torture over the treatment of a witness they believe was tortured before giving incriminating evidence. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 14:40:24 GMT AJI4JETAINLUXH4UBUDQXNHRFY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-tycoons-lawyers-appeal-un-over-witness-torture-accusation-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中国
Nokia's patent dispute persists in China despite deal with one smartphone makerFinnish telecom equipment maker Nokia said on Thursday it had signed a 5G patent agreement with one of China's leading smartphone makers Honor, but its legal battles with other Chinese companies over patents continue. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 14:12:11 GMT TO34OVLLM5LOLPEHBOIVB4FND4 https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/nokias-patent-dispute-persists-china-despite-deal-with-one-smartphone-maker-2024-01-04/Anne Kauranen商业媒体与电信
